SongLyrics.JpnStr: 突[とつ]然[ぜん]降[ふ]る夕[ゆう]立[だち] あぁ傘[かさ]もないや嫌[いや]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Suddenly it's raining. I don't even have an umbrella

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 空[そら]のご機[き]嫌[げん]なんか知[し]らない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't know what the sky is doing

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 季[き]節[せつ]の変[か]わり目[め]の服[ふく]は 何[なに]着[き]りゃいいんだろ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't know what to wear when the seasons change

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 春[はる]と秋[あき] どこいっちゃったんだよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Where did spring and autumn go?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 息[いき]も出[で]来[き]ない 情[じょう]報[ほう]の圧[あつ]力[りょく]
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can't breathe, the pressure of information

SongLyrics.JpnStr: めまいの螺[ら]旋[せん]だ 私[わたし]はどこにいる
SongLyrics.EngStr: The spiral of vertigo, where am I?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こんなに こんなに 息[いき]の音[おと]がするのに
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can hear my breath... so much...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 変[へん]だね 世[せ]界[かい]の音[おと]がしない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Strange, isn't it? The world doesn't sound so good

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 足[た]りない 足[た]りない 誰[だれ]にも気[き]づかれない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Not enough, not enough, no one will notice

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 殴[なぐ]り書[が]きみたいな音[おと] 出[だ]せない状[じょう]態[たい]で叫[さけ]んだよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I screamed, unable to make a sound like a scribble

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 「ありのまま」なんて 誰[だれ]に見[み]せるんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Who am I to show the world 'as it is'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 馬[ば]鹿[か]な私[わたし]は歌[うた]うだけ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm an idiot, all I do is sing

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ぶちまけちゃおうか 星[ほし]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll just throw it all out to the stars

SongLyrics.JpnStr: エリクサーに張[は]り替[か]える作[さ]業[ぎょう]もなんとなくなんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm kind of in the process of replacing it with an elixir

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 欠[か]けた爪[つめ]を少[すこ]し触[さわ]る
SongLyrics.EngStr: I touch my chipped fingernail a little

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 半[はん]径[けい]300mmの体[からだ]で 必[ひっ]死[し]に鳴[な]いてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: A body with a radius of 300 mm is frantically chirping

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 音[おん]楽[がく]にとっちゃ ココが地[ち]球[きゅう]だな
SongLyrics.EngStr: For music, this is the earth

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 空[くう]気[き]を握[にぎ]って 空[そら]を殴[なぐ]るよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll grab some air and punch the sky

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なんにも起[お]きない 私[わたし]は無[む]力[りょく]さ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Nothing happens. I'm nothing

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だけどさ その手[て]で この鉄[てつ]を弾[はじ]いたら
SongLyrics.EngStr: But when I play this iron with my hand...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何[なに]かが変[か]わって見[み]えた…ような。
SongLyrics.EngStr: Something seemed to change... like...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 眩[まぶ]しい 眩[まぶ]しい そんなに光[ひか]るなよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Dazzling, dazzling Don't shine so bright

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 私[わたし]のダサい影[かげ]が より色[いろ]濃[こ]くなってしまうだろ
SongLyrics.EngStr: You'll make my lame shadow darker

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なんでこんな熱[あつ]くなっちゃってんだ 止[と]まんない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Why am I getting so hot? I can't stop

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 馬[ば]鹿[か]な私[わたし]は歌[うた]うだけ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Stupid me, I just sing

SongLyrics.JpnStr: うるさいんだって 心[しん]臓[ぞう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: My heart is so loud

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 蒼[あお]い惑[わく]星[せい] 一[ひと]人[り]ぼっち
SongLyrics.EngStr: Blue planet, all alone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いっぱいの音[おと]を聞[き]いてきた
SongLyrics.EngStr: I've heard so many sounds

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 回[まわ]り続[つづ]けて 幾[いく]億[おく]年[ねん]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Spinning on and on for hundreds of millions of years

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 一[いっ]瞬[しゅん]でもいいから…ああ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if it's just for a moment... ah

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 聞[き]いて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Listen

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 聴[き]けよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Listen

SongLyrics.EngStr: I, I, I am here

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なんかになりたい なりたい 何[なに]者[もの]かでいい
